sentences.sContent: The monkey is beating up and down.
sentences.sContent_eng: The monkey is beating up and down.

sentences.sContent: The monkey engulfed the food whole.
sentences.sCn: 这只猴子囫囵吞下食物。

sentences.sContent: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.sContent_eng: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.sCn: 这只猴子把花园中一整块地方的花都糟蹋了。

phrases.pCn: 胡闹，骗人的把戏；欺骗；恶作剧
猴子把戏；耍猴戏；[口]恶作剧
（美）供儿童攀爬游戏的猴架；（英）健身房的攀架
标准罗经平台；罗经甲板

trans.tranOther: a small brown animal with a long tail, which uses its hands to climb trees and lives in hot countries
